| History                 = The Crazy Thunder Clan were a Japanese biker gang that were were dealing [[Regenix]], which they were getting from a [[Yashida Corporation (Earth-616)|Yashida Corporation]] employee. They threatened his family, forcing him to regularly steal vials of Regenix for them, which he eventually got caught for and executed by the [[Shingen Harada II (Earth-616)|Silver Samurai]]. 

[[James Howlett (Earth-21923)|Logan]] found out about the new drug and shut down the gang's operation in [[Japan]]. The gang relocated to [[Madripoor]] with the inventory they had left, and attempted to reverse engineer the drug. Only for the [[Hand (Earth-616)|Hand]] to find their lab, slaughter the gang and chemists, and take the last vials.{{r|Old Man Logan Vol 2 31}}{{r|Old Man Logan Vol 2 34}}
